bosk.block.zoo.routing.cs#

Classes#

CSBlock

Confidence screening block.

CSFilterBlock

Confidence screening filtering block.

CSJoinBlock

Confidence screening joining (merging) block.
class bosk.block.zoo.routing.cs.CSBlock(eps=1.0)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Confidence screening block.

Parameters:

eps (float) – Confidence threshold.

eps#

Confidence threshold.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • X: Feature data array.

Output slots#

  • best: Best data subsample.

  • mask: Mask for the rest of the data array.

meta#
fit(inputs)#

The block bypasses the fit step.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) –

Return type:

CSBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData

class bosk.block.zoo.routing.cs.CSFilterBlock(input_names)#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Confidence screening filtering block.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • mask: Mask array.

  • input_names[0]: Features data array 0.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Features data array n.

Output slots#

  • input_names[0]: Features data array 0 subset.

  • …

  • input_names[n]: Features data array n subset.

input_names#

List of input names.

meta :bosk.block.meta.BlockMeta#
fit(inputs)#

The block bypasses the fit step.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) –

Return type:

CSFilterBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData

Parameters:

input_names (List[str]) –

class bosk.block.zoo.routing.cs.CSJoinBlock#

Bases: bosk.block.base.BaseBlock

Confidence screening joining (merging) block.

Input slots#

Fit inputs#

The fit step is bypassed.

Transform inputs#

  • best: Best data subsample.

  • refined: Refined data subsample (corresponding to mask == True).

  • mask: Mask of the refined part.

Output slots#

  • output: Output merged data array.

meta#
fit(inputs)#

The block bypasses the fit step.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) –

Return type:

CSJoinBlock

transform(inputs)#

Transform the given input data, i.e. compute values for each output slot.

Parameters:

inputs (bosk.block.base.BlockInputData) – Block input data for the transforming stage.

Returns:

Outputs calculated for the given inputs.

Return type:

bosk.block.base.TransformOutputData
